Reviews.Title: R2D2 droid phone and true love
Reviews.Author: Aimee M. Simmons "Skyrere"
Reviews.Content: My husband is a true die hard star wars fan, and when the limited edition R2D2 droid phones came out he was very upset that our finances were inadequate to get one.  He was pleased to have had the chance to play with my best friend's.  Now he has one, and it makes him giggle like a child.  Even if we never activate it on a actual cellular plan, he will remaind delighted with the purchase.The phone is in excellent condition as well.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: It almost worked great
Reviews.Author: dragonsflame2061
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace mine after the screen shattered.  After I transferred into it, it worked great at first. But it started to freeze and reboot randomly, ultimately the screen now is frozen partway into the Startup process. You can still hear alerts coming in but with the screen frozen there is no functionality, the factory reset procedure doesn't even work. Fortunately this happened within the 30day return window, I have ordered a replacement and will be returning this one..I don't blame the seller in any way, this seems like nothing more than random software failure.

Reviews.Title: 98% pleased
Reviews.Author: zachary t scoggin
Reviews.Content: Phone showed up promptly and works perfectly. my only issue was that the speaker cover was missing and the battery cover was scratched but all in all it was in good condition for a refurb

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: ckeene
Reviews.Content: It was everything I was hoping for. I'm happy to be a proud owner of an R2D2. I wish they would update this phone though. There would be a few features that would be really awesome on this phone.

Reviews.Title: cool phone
Reviews.Author: Misskittys357
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my teenager and it is perfect, very cool has all kinds of neat little features that any Star Wars fan would just love.

Reviews.Title: Pretty cool.
Reviews.Author: brandi barthold
Reviews.Content: I admit I didn't realize I was getting it used, but I probably didn't read far enough. I got this as a gift and he LOVED it.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Kathryn H.
Reviews.Content: This phone is amazing! I use to not be a die hard Star Wars fan...but after my man dragged me into it....I LOVE IT!!

Reviews.Title: Great except for one thing.....
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: Phone came in great condition, works, perfectly and even came in the mail EARLY!The only downside is that it didn't come with the correct backing for the phone, so it doesn't look completely like r2d2, as it should, and I have to order a new backing with my next paycheck so it looks the way it's supposed to.

Reviews.Title: Could've been 5/5 if the charger worked
Reviews.Author: KS
Reviews.Content: Phone works fine, but charger doesn't work. Luckily, it's the same charger as our other phones. Phone itself rocks though...cool Star wars sounds; which is what I was hoping for. Would've given it 5 stars had the charger worked. Shipping time was great-no issues.

Reviews.Title: Beautify & Fast!
Reviews.Author: Angel Crazy "Sandra"
Reviews.Content: Phone was PERFECT and arrived sooner than expected! Made a great birthday gift for my daughter who is a Star Wars fanatic!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Novelty Item
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: Lets start off saying Im a huge star wars fan so I have had this phone since the release and when it started to go nuts I decided to get another I believe with all of the verizon updates and it being such an old phone it starts to act wierd within a couple of weeks and needs the battery pulled a couple of times but because Im such a geek Im keeping it and deeling with the problems

Reviews.Title: I love this phone
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: When I first got I couldn't figure out how to use it. It said I needed to activate it and when i tried it asked for a phone number..but I found out how to reset it to factory settings. This one and my finacee`s regular version. Thats the only reason I didnt rate these a 5. Other than that These phones are wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone!
Reviews.Author: Autumn
Reviews.Content: My third droid 2, first special R2D2 droid 2. I really do love this thing. It is a great product.

Reviews.Title: bought it for my daughter
Reviews.Author: Anniebell
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my daughter because she is a huge star wars fan and she loves it. i was very pleased with how fast we received it and that it was in excellent condition as was stated. I would highly recommend this seller. the phone was as described and works very well.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: M. J. Anderson "MaryJo Anderson"
Reviews.Content: I was super excited to purchase this phone for my youngest son for Christmas.  He's a huge Star Wars fan, and I was delighted to find one of these to surprise him with.  It made for a sad Christmas morning when the phone wouldn't turn on.  I'm really disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Old phone, problems just because of AGE, not design
Reviews.Author: Cade Scott
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT phone.  That being said, it IS in fact from a time that frickin' Obama was NOT in the White House.  (Those were the good ol' days).  OLD, old, OLD.  I love the R2-D2 video, ringers, pictures, wallpapers, and the many other Star Wars additions to this phone!  If you are a Star Wars geek (nerd, whatever) like I tend to be then this is THE phone for you!  It is fun, works "well" most of the time considering its age.

Reviews.Title: Owned this phone since its release
Reviews.Author: Franky Dream
Reviews.Content: I bought this when it was released. It was a better phone then. but over time, with "updates" and "improvements" the phone is now garbage and I constantly want to smash it to the ground. It just hangs a lot and the settings randomly get changed to defaults and a lot of the customized star wars content was wiped out by updates the phone automatically downloads.i hate iphones but once my contract is up with this phone im switching back, android is just garbage.

Reviews.Title: Wrong item
Reviews.Author: NOEL N.
Reviews.Content: I buy VERIZON MOTOROLA A956 A 956 DROID 2 GLOBAL for verizon onlybut you send me VERIZON DROID *Special Edition* R2D2 STAR WARS ANDROID A957 VERIZONThe phone is used but other more big issue: is NOT GSMWhy?
